name: BOOM DRIVER
description:
In BOOM DRIVER, you pilot a large truck with a snowplow mounted to the front. It's not snowing, but there's a bunch of buildings to smash down (and some extra-large TNT, too). Smash into them with enough speed to break them! You have 10 seconds to score as many points as possible. Leave no trace.

Strategy:
Time your boosts, watch the clock, and try to chain together TNT blasts for maximum damage. Plowing through multiple buildings will slightly increase your speed, so try to aim well.

Controls:
Aim with mouse, left click to accelerate, right click to boost.

Submitted for the GDFG monthly jam, made in approximately 3 evenings. More of a proof of concept than anything, but it's essentially a complete high-score style game.

"Leave something behind" & "Mouse-only controls" were the themes.
What I chose to leave behind: A rampaging path of destruction, never having "finished" a game, and the engine Clickteam Fusion.

Fits in a nice and tidy 3.9MB. Have fun!
